topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e68ae763687237877a2500#post_54e68ae763687237877a2500
I can't help but get a little pissed off when people say "He's just whiny" "He should man up." "He should just get over it" FUCK THOSE PEOPLE. You can't just get over crippling depression like that. There is no "manning up" when your father emotionally abuses you and you're surrounded by people care NOTHING about you besides what they can do to sate their own selfishness. That "Feisty redhead" only wants Shinji because if she can't have himthen no one can. That "Smoking hot chick" only keeps him around because he justifies her existence and to mask her own self-loathing.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
Well, I just woke up from the wrong start.

I had been expecting this for a week now and yet, it still surprises me. There are 30+ people, not including me and my family, in my house. They will be staying for the night for an upcoming wedding. They are all related to my mom but I have no idea who any of them are.

Right now, I'm more worried about the damn kids. I hope they won't touch my stuff. Especially my laptop.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976
